mapper.insert: insert into tbl_shop ( sname, content, stype, deposit, rent, floor, surface, p_surface, park, elev, location, toilet, mmid, lat , lng ) values ( #{sname},#{content}, #{stype}, #{deposit}, #{rent}, #{floor}, #{surface}, #{p_surface}, #{park}, #{elev}, #{location}, #{toilet}, #{mmid}, #{lat} , #{lng} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_shop where bno > 0 order by bno asc
select * from tbl_shop where mmid=#{mmid} and bno > 0

select * from tbl_shop
order by bno desc limit #{skip}, #{amount}
select count(bno) from tbl_shop where bno > 0
select viewcnt from tbl_shop where bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_shop set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select:
select * from tbl_shop
order by bno desc limit 0, 20
